findings.title: Unprotected constructor
findings.description: The constructor of StakeStationLock contract is public and unprotected.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens may have issues with fee-on-transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function due to fee on transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: deposit
findings.description: External function deposit has nonReentrant modifier

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The transfer function allows a specified number of tokens to be transferred to a specified address.

findings.title: Withdraw Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The withdraw function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: setDuration
findings.description: External function setDuration has onlyOwner access control.

findings.title: setSettings
findings.description: The setSettings function has an access control issue as it can only be called by the owner.

findings.title: resetAllowances
findings.description: The resetAllowances function has a vulnerability with onlyOwner access control.

findings.title: _resetAllowances
findings.description: The _resetAllowances function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Receive Ether
findings.description: The contract can receive Ether without any restrictions or validation.
